pullRequest.title: Make the UpdateRolloverLifecycleDateStep retryable
pullRequest.bodyText:
This makes the "update-rollover-lifecycle-date" step, which is part of the
rollover action, retryable. It also adds an integration test to check the
step is retried and it eventually succeeds.
Related to #48183

commit.message:
Make the UpdateRolloverLifecycleDateStep retryable

This makes the "update-rollover-lifecycle-date" step, which is part of the
rollover action, retryable. It also adds an integration test to check the
step is retried and it eventually succeeds.
Wait for the update lifecycle date step to fail only once
